A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
After seeing it for the 3rd time... I couldn't believe that it got worse each time. I\, as a majority of the world\, am a huge star wars fan. This was a bigger disappointment than all 3 prequels combined. 

1.Canto Bight was a Train wreck used to deepen a useless character. 

2. The incompetence of the first order as well as the resistance was astonishing. I couldn't believe the mistakes they made. My 8 year old and I we coming up with better military tactics as we sat and watched it.

3. They killed off 2 of the strongest characters while building a story to weaken the new villain and protagonist. 

That's not all\, that's just the biggest atrocities. This film doesn't feel like it was made by a fan... it felt like someone who hated star wars... and JJ Abrahms. I have never seen a sequel crap on its predecessor so hard. Good job Rian\, you may have ruined this trilogy. Literally the only reason I gave this half a star was the throne room fight scene and the FTL battering ram.
